item.title: Japan returns pandas to China amid strained ties - BBC
item.description: Japan returns pandas to China amid strained ties BBCCrowds bid farewell to Japan’s last pandas before return to China amid souring ties CNNBlack and white and sent back over: end of panda diplomacy as Japan returns bears to China The GuardianCrowds flock to Tokyo zoo to see pandas before they leave for China CNAThe last 2 pandas in Japan are leaving for China as ties are strained NBC News

item.title: Tearful goodbyes as Japan returns pandas to China amid worsening ties
item.description: The twin cubs’ departure will leave Japan without any pandas for the first time since 1972.
